original_text: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
korean_text: 무교절의 첫날 곧 유월절 양 잡는 날에 제자들이 예수께 여짜오되 우리가 어디로 가서 선생님께서 유월절 음식을 잡수시게 준비하기를 원하시나이까 하매

sentences.original_text: And first day of unleavened bread
Where wilt thou that we go
and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 유월절을 잡수시도록 준비하게 하리이까
